modules.name: 人物Q版盲盒

inputParams.description: 人物图片，用于生成人物Q版盲盒
提示词，用于生成人物Q版盲盒
inputParams.default: The cute Q-version doll character, man, C4D, wears cool streetwear, full-length portrait, the character is rendered in ultra high definition against a light purple background with soft lighting, emphasizing the character's lively personality and bold fashion sense.

inputParams.description: 负面提示词，用于生成人物Q版盲盒
inputParams.default: Bad quality,worst quality,normal quality,low-res,sketch,poor design,deformed,disfigured,soft,bad composition,simple design,boring,watermark,text,error,cropped,blurry,nsfw,mutated,missing limb,mutated hands and fingers,malformed limbs,

modules.name: 图生视频
modules.description: 上传人物图片，一键生成视频

inputParams.description: 人物图片，一键生成视频

inputParams.default: Dance, the movements are smooth, first twist the waist on the left, then twist the waist on the right, and finally make your hands to the heart. Documentary style, close-up of the whole body dance in the middle scene, full of dynamics.

inputParams.description: 负面提示词，用于生成人物Q版盲盒
inputParams.default: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走

modules.name: 微型世界
modules.description: 生成微型世界图片，创意拉满

inputParams.description: 提示词，用于生成微型世界图片
inputParams.default: Miniature world, This is a photograph of a detailed, miniature scene featuring tiny figurines of workers harvesting watermelons. The figurines wear straw hats and beige overalls, shown lifting large green watermelons into wooden carts. The watermelons are realistically detailed with dark green stripes and some cut open to reveal bright red flesh with black seeds. The background is a blurred summer field with distant sunflowers and a clear sky. The ground is textured with dry soil and scattered hay to enhance the rural vibe.

modules.name: 替换背景

inputParams.default: Jewelry display, still life, background with flowers, light and shadow art, 8K, master's work, realistic,

inputParams.description: 负面提示词，用于商品背景替换
inputParams.default: (worst quality:2),(low quality:2),(normal quality:2),lowres,bad anatomy,bad hands,((monochrome)),((grayscale)) watermark,moles,large breast,big breast,

modules.name: Q版职业IP

inputParams.description: 人物图片，一键生成跳舞视频

inputParams.default: The cute Q-version doll character, C4D, wears a white doctor's coat over cool streetwear, with a stethoscope around the neck, full-length portrait. Rendered in ultra high definition with a minimal light orange background, highlighting their caring and professional vibe.
